  • Constructor Details

    • CustomerManager

      public CustomerManager(UIOverlay overlay, FoodTextureManager textureManager, int mode, int customerNum, int difficulty)
      Handles all orders from the customers, including recipes and wait times.
      Parameters:
      overlay - The overlay for UI elements.
      textureManager - The manager for any food textures.
      mode - The game mode, either scenario or endless (0 or 1).
      customerNum - The number of orders placed in scenario mode.
      difficulty - The game difficulty.

  • Method Details

    • updateCustomerOrders

      public void updateCustomerOrders(float delta)
      Updates info relating to customer orders. Generates a new one if enough time has passed and their is space. Sets progress bars to new values according to remaining wait time.
      Parameters:
      delta - The time passed since last call.

    • removeCustomerOrder

      public void removeCustomerOrder(int index)
      Clears customer order arrays when a recipe is removed, including the order, wait times and progress.
      Parameters:
      index - The recipe location to be removed.

    • removeCustomerOrder

      public void removeCustomerOrder(Recipe recipe)
      Alternative method for removeCustomerOrder(int index) should the index not be known. Searches the orders array for the first instance of the given recipe.
      Parameters:
      recipe - The recipe to be removed.

    • resetCustomerWait

      public void resetCustomerWait()

    • checkRecipe

      public boolean checkRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      Check to see if the recipe matches the currently requested order.
      Parameters:
      recipe - The recipe to check against the current order.
      Returns:
      A boolean signifying if the recipe is correct.

    • nextRecipe

      public void nextRecipe()
      Complete the current order and move on to the next one. Then update the UI. If all the recipes are completed, then show the winning UI.

    • setRemainingCustomers

      public void setRemainingCustomers()

    • addRecipeStation

      public void addRecipeStation(RecipeStation station)

      public int getRemainingCustomers()
